Dating: 25TH DYNASTY AND CONTEMPORARIES (not before); 26TH DYNASTY (not after)
Name: Shabti of Hor-em-akhbit
Description: This figure is perfectly formed and is reminiscent of an osirid pillar on a pedestal. On the front and back, the shabti spell is carved in elegant hieroglyphs. Hor-em-akhbit's title is "royal scribe".
